text: Kuvumelekile kuni ukuba nidibane ngesondo nabafazi benu ebusuku ngeentsuku zokuzila. Bona baziingubo zenu kanti nani nikwanjalo kubo. UAllâh Uyazi okokuba benisoloko niziqhatha, kodwa Yena Wabuya ngenceba kuni, Wanixolela. Ke ngoku yabelanani nabo ngesondo, nize nifune oko uAllâh Anibekele kona (abantwana), nitye ukutya kude kuvele umgca omhlophe woms’obomvu ubonakale, ucace, wohluke kumgca omnyama, nize nigqibezele ukuzila kwenu kude kuwe ubusuku. Ke kaloku musani ukwabelana ngesondo nabo xa nikwi-i’tikâf62 ezimasjid. Le yimiqathango (emiselwe) nguAllâh, ke ngoko musani ukusondela kubo. Wenza njalo ke uAllâh ukucacisa iiVesi zaKhe eluntwini khon’ukuze babe ngamalungisa
